TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. There are spiders in the Kool-aid

I wish for happiness.

Granted. Some random person you dont know anything about and was already happy, is now happy.

I wish i did better with my comics...

Granted, but now everyone hates them

I wish i could SSTO in ksp :l

Granted, but it can only SSTO from Gilly.

I need a cool. clean, refreshing, tall, 18oz, non-toxic, non-poisoned, no bugs, glass of kool-aid that is still produced and is very tasteful. Without spiders, only 100% pure homogeneous kool-aid, in a safe handheld, slip-proof, with a controlled reliable straw drinking mechanism.

Granted. Its so homogenous its literally hitler.

I wish i had some coffe right now.

Granted but it is instant coffee and also burnt, on top of that it is now cold and there is no sugar or dairy.

I wish I could see which of my mods was causing a memory leak.

Granted, but like Skyrim you can't remove them without starting a new game.

I wish there is a material more useful than duct tape.

Granted. You become duct tape.

I wish to spread my wings and fly away.

granted, you get shot down by a howitzer

i wish i had a parrot

Granted. You receive a huge, mutant parrot the size of a small truck. You imagine how bad it goes from there.

I wish to cast spells!

granted, all of them gives you cancer

i wish i could do anything i want

Granted, but you can do everything only once, including breath, so you will die in a few minutes

I wish I had Witcher senses

Granted. You're a public threat.

I wish to see Minmus in real life.

You see Minmus, hurtling towards your location, at 2 km/s.

I wish to have the Force.

You see Minmus, hurtling towards your location, at 2 km/s.

I wish to have the Force.

Granted, but Darth Vader can sense you

I wish I had a 64 core processor.

Granted, but you can only use one at a time.

I wish...

Granted, therefore you get nothing.

I wish I had a genie.

Granted, but the genie has no wishes.

I wish that I could meet Jebediah in real life.

granted, he crashes a srb on your face

i wish i could teleport to everywhere i wanted

granted, he crashes a srb on your face

i wish i could teleport to everywhere i wanted

Granted, but everything in the universe is moving so fast, you find yourself in space without a suit.

I wish I had my own country.

granted, everyone there hunts you

i wish brasil owned the world

Granted. The world is worth $2.

I wish I could come up with a wish...

granted, you wish for painfull death

i wish i had a M4A1

Granted. No ammo on you.

I wish to actually fly in the KSP's aerodynamics.

Granted. Now you can't fly in real aerodynamics.

I wish I had an infinite food button.
